Name: Removing prohibition on sidewalk obstructions, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to removing the prohibition on sidewalk obstructions on certain streets in Brooklyn.
RTF:
{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}
{\stylesheet{ Normal;}{\s1 heading 1;}{\s2 heading 2;}}
\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\ul Be it enacted by the Council as follows:\ulnone\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\sl480\slmult1\tab Section one.  Paragraph four of subdivision c of section 19-136 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as last amended by local law 104 of 1993, is amended by amending subdivision a and adding new subdivisions f, g, h and i to read as follows:\par
\tab 19-136. c. 4. On the following streets where general vending has been prohibited by the street vendor review panel pursuant to section 20-465.1 of this code and any rules promulgated thereunder, the provisions of paragraph one of this subdivision shall not apply:\par
\pard{\pntext\f0 (a)\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlbody\pnf0\pnindent360\pnstart1\pnlcltr{\pntxtb(}{\pntxta)}}
\ltrpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1\tx0 Thirteenth avenue between 39\super th\nosupersub  street and [44\super th\nosupersub ] \ul 55\super th\ulnone\nosupersub  street in the borough of Brooklyn; \par
{\pntext\f0 (b)\tab}Newkirk Plaza between Foster avenue and Newkirk avenue in the borough of Brooklyn;\par
{\pntext\f0 (c)\tab}Eighty-sixth street between Bay Parkway and 23\super rd\nosupersub  avenue in the borough of Brooklyn;\par
{\pntext\f0 (d)\tab}West 4\super th\nosupersub  street between Sixth avenue and Seventh avenue in the borough of Manhattan;\par
{\pntext\f0 (e)\tab}Delancey street between Orchard street and Essex street in the borough of Manhattan;\par
\ul{\pntext\f0 (f)\tab}Sixteenth avenue between 38\super th\nosupersub  street and 60\super th\nosupersub  street in the borough of Brooklyn;\par
{\pntext\f0 (g)\tab}Eighteenth avenue between Ocean Parkway and 60\super th\nosupersub  street in the borough of Brooklyn;\par
{\pntext\f0 (h)\tab}Avenue J between Coney Island avenue and East 16\super th\nosupersub  street in the borough of Brooklyn;\par
{\pntext\f0 (i)\tab}Coney Island avenue between Avenues I and P in the borough of Brooklyn.\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\sl480\slmult1\ulnone\'a72. This local law shall take effect immediately after it is enacted into law.\ul  \par
\pard\ltrpar\sl480\slmult1\ulnone   \par
